Posts.Content: cazlove2004 wrote: Had a grade 3 breast cancer had a lumpectomy and two lymph nodes taken out 4 years ago. Still can not lift well with left arm dropped a few things over the years. Even burnt my arm on Christmas Day as dropped tin out of oven. My consultant does not even know why any suggestions please? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: After surgery 4 years ago cazlove2004 dlb823
